summary.span: 为打开的连接更改当前数据库。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open connection.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

summary.span: 此方法是关闭任何打开连接的首选方法。

span.span: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回滚所有挂起的事务。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然后释放到连接池连接，或如果禁用连接池时关闭连接。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 应用程序可以调用不止一次。An application can call more than one time. 不会生成异常。No exception is generated. 如果超出范围，它没有闭合。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`，它们在功能上等效。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`, which are functionally equivalent. 如果连接池值`Pooling`设置为`true`或`yes`，这也会释放物理连接。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, this also releases the physical connection. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`上**连接**即**DataReader**，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a **Connection**, a **DataReader**, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

exception.span: 打开连接时出现的连接级别的错误。

span.span: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.
Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置用于打开连接的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open the connection.

value.span: 用来建立初始连接的连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string used to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。

span.span: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection. 若要确定哪些设置有效，请参阅你使用的连接的特定类型的文档。To determine which settings are valid, see the documentation for the specific type of connection that you are using.

value.span: 默认值是由您正在使用的连接的特定类型确定的。

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DataSource As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

span.span: The name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据库的连接已关闭，返回中包含的任何内容为`DataSource`关键字。If the connection to the database is closed, the returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword. 如果连接已打开并数据源关键字值以开始"|`datadirectory`|"，该属性返回中包含的任何内容为`DataSource`关键字仅。If the connection is open and the data source keyword's value starts with "|`datadirectory`|", the property returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword only. 如果数据库的连接处于打开状态，该属性返回的本机提供程序返回有关`DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`，如果为空，本机提供程序的`DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME`返回。If the connection to the database is open, the property returns what the native provider returns for the `DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`, and if that is empty, the native provider's `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME` is returned.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed
abstract member EnlistTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction -> unit override this.EnlistTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction -> unit

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定事务中登记。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用`EnlistTransaction`方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the `EnlistTransaction` method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例，`EnlistTransaction`中提供的功能利用用于管理命名空间的分布式事务。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, `EnlistTransaction` takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions. 显式事务中登记连接之后, 不能取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。Once a connection is explicitly enlisted in a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes.

span.span: Transactions (ADO.NET)
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: virtual System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);
abstract member GetSchema : string * string[] -> System.Data.DataTable override this.GetSchema : string * string[] -> System.Data.DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 为请求的架构指定一组限制值。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 通过使用指定字符串作为架构名称，指定字符串数组作为限制值，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`参数可以提供*n*深度的值，指定的特定集合的限制集合。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要将值设置给定的限制，并且未设置其他限制的值，需要将前面的限制，则为 null，然后将放在你想要为指定值的限制为适当的值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 此示例是"表"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果想要返回仅具有所有者"Carl"相关联的表，以及"Tables"集合存在三个限制 （数据库、 所有者和表名），则必须通过至少以下值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name) and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you must pass in the following values at least: null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这将是相同的映射与传入 null，这是传入空字符串作为参数值不同。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可指定参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 如果连接是与事务相关联，正在执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

span.span: is specified as null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task OpenAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 的异步版本，打开由 指定的设置的数据库连接。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

summary.span: 此方法通过 CancellationToken.None 调用虚拟方法 。

span.span: This method invokes the virtual method with CancellationToken.None.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用，必须返回直到返回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然后，如果连接成功必须返回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果连接失败，必须返回。If the connection fails, must return . 调用将尝试取消或关闭相应调用。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 可选择性接受取消标记。

span.span: The cancellation token can optionally be honored.

summary.span: 默认实现调用同步 调用并返回已完成任务。

span.span: The default implementation invokes the synchronous call and returns a completed task.

summary.span: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的 cancellationToken。

span.span: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.

span.span: Exceptions thrown by Open will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.

summary.span: 在返回的任务完成前，不要调用 对象的其他方法和属性。

span.span: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用，必须返回直到返回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然后，如果连接成功必须返回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果连接失败，必须返回。If the connection fails, must return . 调用将尝试取消或关闭相应调用。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

Function BeginTransaction () As IDbTransaction Implements IDbConnection.BeginTransaction

summary.span: 开始一项数据库事务。

span.span: Begins a database transaction.

returns.span: 一个表示新事务的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 以指定的 值开始数据库事务。

span.span: Begins a database transaction with the specified value.

summary.span: 创建并返回与当前连接关联的 对象。

span.span: Creates and returns a object that is associated with the current connection.

returns.span: 与连接关联的 对象。

span.span: A object that is associated with the connection.
